text:
Elmer G. Hughes, 99, served in the Army Air Corps during World War II, & later served in Korea & Vietnam. About 200 people were given the #COVID19 vaccine today, as part of the phase 1b group. Appointments are required.

For COVID-19 #vaccine info visit: https://t.co/gRnX63tJXe https://t.co/fBGOpJt8OM
